description:
Locke has done a handful of straight films, so like most of these guys, he was looking for more video work that might pay better. He lives in an area with a lot of straight filming, so it was easy for him to pick-up gigs.
I love his look. Very handsome, and has nice body on him too. His solo is polished and you can tell he is a confident performer.
He is not too sure about the guy-on-guy stuff, but is down to at least get head. Stay-tuned next week for that video.
title: Locke - Solo
